closable.description: Displays a button to switch back to display mode.

active.description: Whether the content is displayed or not.

disabled.description: When present, it specifies that the element should be disabled.

closeIcon.description: Icon to display in the close button.

displayProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLDivElement to display container.

closeButtonProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the close button.

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: open
events.description: Callback to invoke when inplace is opened.

events.name: close
events.description: Callback to invoke when inplace is closed.
